typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceMovie
sourceMovie select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rotten_Tomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select
select filter(toInteger(year)>1910) ~> filter1
filter1 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif(locate('|',genres)>0,left(genres,locate('|',genres)-1),genres)) ~> PrimaryGenre
PrimaryGenre window(over(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	desc(Rotten_Tomato, true),
	RankRating = rank()) ~> Ranking
Ranking aggregate(groupBy(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	AvgRating = avg(toInteger(Rotten_Tomato)),
		Highest_Rated = first(title),
		Lowest_Rated = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> Aggregate
